examples: 'Thanks,' he answered.
Thanks Courtney for sending this out.
- Thanks, I thrifted it.
- Yeah. - Thanks, Wren, for sponsoring today's video.
- Thanks dudes, we'll see you tomorrow.
words.defineEn: said when someone helps us or does something nice for us
words.defineVi: nói khi ai đó giúp chúng tôi hoặc làm điều gì đó tốt đẹp cho chúng tôi

examples: I see you later, bye!
Bye. Say bye.
Bye. Say bye.
Have a good one, bye.
Have a good one, bye.
words.defineEn: a word we say when we are leaving someone or when they are leaving, or at the end of a phone call
words.defineVi: một từ chúng tôi nói khi chúng tôi rời khỏi ai đó hoặc khi họ rời đi, hoặc khi kết thúc cuộc gọi điện thoại

examples: My family and I look forward to the weekend every week.
They visit their grandmother every weekend.
Weekends are when I can work on personal projects.
They often visit their grandparents on weekends.
We often take weekend trips to nearby cities for sightseeing and relaxation.
words.defineEn: the days of the week, usually Saturday and Sunday, when people do not have to go to work or school
words.defineVi: các ngày trong tuần, thường là thứ bảy và chủ nhật, khi mọi người không phải đi làm hoặc đi học

examples: Lots of couples have problems in the first year of marriage.
The problem has now reached crisis point.
The problem was always at the back of my mind.
There are problems.
The problem is all in his head.
words.defineEn: something that causes difficulties and is hard to overcome
words.defineVi: một cái gì đó gây ra khó khăn và khó vượt qua

examples: There's a lovely park right on our doorstep.
She was a lovely woman and my mother truly enjoyed her company.
I have been as busy as a beaver these last few weeks crocheting up custom orders for some lovely customers.
They’ve let that lovely old house fall to pieces around them.
The rose was pink and had a lovely scent.
words.defineEn: very beautiful or attractive
words.defineVi: rất đẹp hoặc hấp dẫn

words.defineEn: a cafe or bar where one can buy non-alcoholic drinks and light snacks
words.defineVi: một quán cà phê hoặc quán bar nơi người ta có thể mua đồ uống không cồn và đồ ăn nhẹ

examples: Schools have welcomed such arrangements with open arms.
Welcome to my world!
"You're welcome."
When all fruit fails, welcome haws.
A port in a storm is a welcome thing.
words.defineEn: a word that we use to greet someone when they arrive
words.defineVi: một từ mà chúng ta sử dụng để chào đón ai đó khi họ đến

examples: Hi, what is your name?
Hi, would you like to join us for lunch?
He introduced himself by saying, "Hi, my name is Alex."
Hi, nice to meet you.
Hi, here to buy your country.
words.defineEn: we say when we see someone and want to greet them
words.defineVi: chúng ta nói khi chúng ta thấy ai đó và muốn chào họ

examples: For the first offence I was given a fine.
There's a fine line between humour and inappropriateness.
Our fine traditions give us a head start on the competition.
Farah ran a fine race to take the gold medal.
If he wants to play a game of cat and mouse, fine, I'll play.
words.defineEn: not ill, injured, or in a bad state
words.defineVi: không bị bệnh, bị thương, hoặc trong tình trạng xấu

examples: Thank you for putting in a word for me.
Thank you for choosing our restaurant.
Thank you so much for asking me.
Thank you so much for coming in for the interview.
Thank you all for attending this staff meeting.
words.defineEn: something we say to someone to show we are grateful to them for something that they have done for us or given us
words.defineVi: một cái gì đó chúng tôi nói với ai đó để thể hiện rằng chúng tôi biết ơn họ vì điều gì đó mà họ đã làm cho chúng tôi hoặc cho chúng tôi

examples: Her work has given pleasure to millions of readers.
She takes pleasure in her work.
The books in the library are available for checkout at their pleasure.
The murderer was imprisoned at His Majesty's pleasure.
I'm just going to find pleasure in perfect little moments like this.
words.defineEn: a courteous response to express that one is happy or willing to do something for someone else, typically in response to an expression of gratitude
words.defineVi: một phản ứng lịch sự để bày tỏ rằng một người hạnh phúc hoặc sẵn sàng làm điều gì đó cho người khác, thường là để đáp lại một biểu hiện của lòng biết ơn

examples: Excuse me, I lost my train of thoughts.
Excuse me, but there’s a phone call for you.
Excuse me, is this the way to the station?
Excuse me, you're wanted on the phone.
Excuse me, but I don't think that's true.
words.defineEn: said before asking someone a question, as a way of politely getting their attention
words.defineVi: nói trước khi đặt câu hỏi cho ai đó, như một cách lịch sự để thu hút sự chú ý của họ

examples: They often go several days without driving At All.
words.defineEn: in the slightest degree or in any respect
words.defineVi: ở mức độ nhỏ nhất hoặc trong bất kỳ khía cạnh nào

examples: "Sorry, I've run out."
Sorry, I'm still really groggy.
Sorry, what did you say?
Sorry, I don't follow.
Sorry, could you please hand me the book?
words.defineEn: a word we say to apologize for something or to say we are embarrassed
words.defineVi: một từ chúng tôi nói để xin lỗi cho một cái gì đó hoặc để nói rằng chúng tôi đang xấu hổ

examples: Good morning, it's a beautiful day today!
She didn't even take the time to wish me good morning.
Good morning your honors may please the court.
Say good morning.
Say good morning!
words.defineEn: something we say when we want to greet or say hello to someone in the morning
words.defineVi: một cái gì đó chúng tôi nói khi chúng tôi muốn chào hỏi hoặc chào ai đó vào buổi sáng

words.defineEn: used to say goodbye to a person when one expects to see them again
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để nói lời tạm biệt với một người khi một người muốn gặp lại họ

words.defineEn: used to emphasize the intensity or extent of something.
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để nhấn mạnh cường độ hoặc mức độ của một cái gì đó.

examples: A fool at forty is a fool indeed.
This was a red-letter day indeed.
Success has many fathers, failure is an orphan, indeed.
It takes a thief to catch a thief indeed.
It seems to me that the press and some others are indeed using the measure to dig up dirt on the government.
words.defineEn: used to emphasize or confirm a statement
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để nhấn mạnh hoặc xác nhận một tuyên bố

examples: This is a good time-- - Cheers to you.
My favorite was pretty much, first several interviews I did for Cheers.
(CHEERS, APPLAUSE) Remember how I told you about his character and convictions, his decency and his grace, the traits that we’ve seen every day that he’s served our country in the White House?
words.defineEn: used as a casual way to say goodbye
words.defineVi: được sử dụng như một cách thông thường để nói lời tạm biệt

examples: Of course there is some truth in all this, but only up to a point.
Of course we're not going to sell the house!
Of course I'll be there - with bells on!
Of course we'll change it for a larger size, Madam.
Of course, I suppose 20 years does make a lot of difference.
words.defineEn: used to give permission or express agreement
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để cho phép hoặc bày tỏ sự đồng ý

examples: "Yeah, and pigs might fly."
Yeah, and pigs might fly.
Yeah, that's the spirit!
Yeah, but it rocks! ’
Ha, yeah right, and the moon is made of cheese.
words.defineEn: another way of saying 'yes'
words.defineVi: một cách khác để nói 'có'

words.defineEn: used to politely answer someone who thanks us
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để trả lời một cách lịch sự ai đó cảm ơn chúng tôi

examples: Aren't you pleased to see me?
And didn't he just sound pleased as punch about that?
The artist didn't have any particular outcome in mind when she started painting, but was pleased with the final result.
It was safe to say I was pleased to see the back of it!
The artist was pleased when her painting sold for a high price at the gallery.
words.defineEn: feeling happy and satisfied with something that has happened or with someone's actions
words.defineVi: cảm thấy hạnh phúc và hài lòng với điều gì đó đã xảy ra hoặc với hành động của ai đó

words.phonetic: hɪɹ ɪz tʊ ɛsbiː slæʃ ɛstiːeɪtʃ
words.defineEn: used before drinking in honor of a person or thing
words.defineVi: được sử dụng trước khi uống để vinh danh một người hoặc vật
